discourse_list.title: Overview of the W3C Payment Handler API for the Web

content.content: Below is a link-fest relevant to Ethereum UX. Also, this effort is a good example of standards work in action:    Medium – 21 Jun 18    Standardizing Payments With The Payment Handler API Most people rarely think about payments and how they work. It really only comes up when we need to get up from the couch to get our wallet… Reading time: 3 min read        Here is the implementation overview for Chrome:    Google Developers    Bring your payment method to the web with the Payment Handler API Chrome beta 68 ships with the Payment Handler API -- the new, open, and standard way for web-based payment applications to be offered as a payment option during checkout. It enables merchants to accept a wide variety of payment options within a...       This is a discussion on “Mozilla standards positions” regarding cryptocurrency support with Payment Request API. Provides some insight into how other dev communities regard cryptocurrencies.   github.com/mozilla/standards-positions     	      Cryptocurrency support with Payment Request API            opened 05:13AM - 26 Mar 18 UTC             closed 10:28AM - 03 Apr 18 UTC               marcoscaceres               Request for Mozilla Position on an Emerging Web Specification Specification Title: Payment Request Specification or proposal URL: w3c/payment-request#694 Other information The Payment Request API currently...
